How true. I have never heard an anti-Evolution arguement from someone who has a clear understanding of the details of Evolution. 
 
 On another point, it always struck me as curious why the Bush administration would have chosen Colbert to speak during a Roast at the White House Correspondents' dinner. Perhaps Colbert's extreme parody of the religious right was misinterpreted as subtle well intentioned ribbing. What may seem extreme to us is just slight exaggeration to them.
